title: Nixons diplomatic overtures to China - motivation

content.prompt: Richard Nixon’s diplomatic overtures to the People’s Republic of China were motivated in part by his belief that China

choices.label: was ready to embrace a capitalist economy and democratic government
was a more legitimate representative of the Chinese people than was Taiwan
had become an important global power that could not be ignored
might form an alliance with South Korea and Japan against the United States
was likely to shun cultural and educational exchanges with Western European nations
